TABLE.NAME: hippotrack
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the hippotrack activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID du cours contenant l'activité

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Nom de l'activité

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp de création

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp de modification

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Description de l'activité

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format de la description

TABLE.NAME: hippotrack_datasets
TABLE.COMMENT: Stocke les ensembles de données pour l'exercice

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Nom de la position

FIELD.NAME: sigle
FIELD.COMMENT: Sigle de la position

FIELD.NAME: rotation
FIELD.COMMENT: Angle de rotation en degrés

FIELD.NAME: inclinaison
FIELD.COMMENT: Inclinaison (1 = bien fléchi, -1 = mal fléchi)

FIELD.NAME: vue_anterieure
FIELD.COMMENT: Image de la vue antérieure

FIELD.NAME: vue_laterale
FIELD.COMMENT: Image de vue latérale

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of the session for a given activity and user.

FIELD.NAME: id_hippotrack
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the current hippotrack instance

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user whose attempt this is.

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when the attempt was started.

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when the attempt was submitted. 0 if the attempt has not been submitted yet.

FIELD.NAME: sumgrades
FIELD.COMMENT: Total marks for this attempt.

FIELD.NAME: questionsdone
FIELD.COMMENT: Total questions responded for this attempt.

FIELD.NAME: gradednotificationsenttime
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp when the 'graded' notification was sent.

FIELD.NAME: difficulty
FIELD.COMMENT: Easy of Hard

TABLE.NAME: hippotrack_attempt
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores student responses and attempt statistics.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Standard Moodle primary key.

FIELD.NAME: id_session
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the current hippotrack instance

FIELD.NAME: id_dataset
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the current hippotrack instance

FIELD.NAME: attempt_number
FIELD.COMMENT: Numero de l'attempt pour la session.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Nom du dataset entrée par l'étudiant

FIELD.NAME: sigle
FIELD.COMMENT: Sigle de la position

FIELD.NAME: partogram
FIELD.COMMENT: Réponse de l'étudiant: inclinaison et rotation du partogramme

FIELD.NAME: schema_simplifie
FIELD.COMMENT: Réponse de l'étudiant: inclinaison et rotation du schema simplifie

FIELD.NAME: vue_anterieure
FIELD.COMMENT: Nom du fichier image de la vue antérieure

FIELD.NAME: vue_laterale
FIELD.COMMENT: Nom du fichier image de la vue latérale

FIELD.NAME: success
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if the attempt is successful, 0 otherwise
